attributes.action: say to the eu no more immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: britain is a tiny island now has over 60 million people livivng on it how many are british? we do not have enough homes, jobs, money for british people let alone foreign nationals aswell. we are paying more tax and more council tax to pay for all the immigrants coming into this country.

rejection.details:
There are lots of peitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigration
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
